languages.text: "Здесь... что-то не так. По законам Империума даже Лорд-инквизитор не в праве судить Вольного Торговца единолично. Я отказываюсь в этом участвовать!"

traits.locale_text: "Здесь... что-то не так. По законам Империума даже Лорд-инквизитор не в праве судить Вольного Торговца единолично. Я отказываюсь в этом участвовать!"

languages.text: "Something... is wrong. According to the statutes of the Imperium, not even a Lord Inquisitor can unilaterally pass judgement on a Rogue Trader. I refuse to take part in this!"
languages.original_text: "Здесь... что-то не так. По законам Империума даже Лорд-инквизитор не в праве судить Вольного Торговца единолично. Я отказываюсь в этом участвовать!"

traits.locale_text: "Something... is wrong. According to the statutes of the Imperium, not even Lord Inquisitor can judge a Rogue Trader by himself. I refuse to take part in this!"
"Something... is wrong. According to the statutes of the Imperium, not even Lord Inquisitor can judge a Rogue Trader by himself. I refuse to take part in this!"
"Something... is wrong. According to the statutes of the Imperium, not even Lord Inquisitor can judge a Rogue Trader by himself. I refuse to take part in this!"
"Something... is wrong. According to the statutes of the Imperium, not even Lord Inquisitor can judge a Rogue Trader by himself. I refuse to take part in this!"
"Something... is wrong. According to the statutes of the Imperium, not even a Lord Inquisitor can unilaterally pass judgment on a Rogue Trader. I refuse to take part in this!"
"Something... is wrong. According to the statutes of the Imperium, not even a Lord Inquisitor can unilaterally pass judgement on a Rogue Trader. I refuse to take part in this!"
"Something... is wrong. According to the statutes of the Imperium, not even a Lord Inquisitor can unilaterally pass judgement on a Rogue Trader. I refuse to take part in this!"

languages.text: « Quelque chose... ne va pas. Selon les statuts de l'Imperium, même le seigneur inquisiteur ne peut juger unilatéralement un libre-marchand. Je refuse de prendre part à tout ceci ! »
languages.original_text: "Something... is wrong. According to the statutes of the Imperium, not even a Lord Inquisitor can unilaterally pass judgement on a Rogue Trader. I refuse to take part in this!"

traits.locale_text: « Quelque chose... ne va pas. Selon les statuts de l'Imperium, même le seigneur inquisiteur ne peut juger unilatéralement un libre-marchand. Je refuse de prendre part à tout ceci ! »

languages.text: “这件事情……不太对劲。根据帝国法令，哪怕是大审判官本人，也无权单方面对行商浪人进行审判。我拒绝参与这场审判！”
languages.original_text: "Something... is wrong. According to the statutes of the Imperium, not even a Lord Inquisitor can unilaterally pass judgement on a Rogue Trader. I refuse to take part in this!"

traits.locale_text: “这件事情……不太对劲。根据帝国法令，哪怕是审判长本人，也无权单方面对行商浪人进行审判。我拒绝参与这场审判！”

languages.text: 「何かが…おかしい。帝国法ではロード・インクィジターであろうと、一方的に自由開拓者を裁くことはできないはず。私はこの裁判を拒否する！」
languages.original_text: "Something... is wrong. According to the statutes of the Imperium, not even a Lord Inquisitor can unilaterally pass judgement on a Rogue Trader. I refuse to take part in this!"

traits.locale_text: 「何かが…おかしい。帝国法ではロード・インクィジターであろうと、一方的に自由開拓者を裁くことはできないはず。私はこの裁判を拒否する！」

languages.text: "Irgendetwas ... stimmt nicht. Gemäß der Statuten des Imperiums darf nicht einmal ein Großinquisitor ein eigenmächtiges Urteil über einen Freihändler fällen. Ich will hiermit nichts zu tun haben!"
languages.original_text: "Something... is wrong. According to the statutes of the Imperium, not even a Lord Inquisitor can unilaterally pass judgement on a Rogue Trader. I refuse to take part in this!"

traits.locale_text: "Irgendetwas ... stimmt nicht. Laut Statuten des Imperiums darf nicht einmal der Großinquisitor über Freihändler urteilen. Ich will damit nichts zu tun haben!"

languages.text: «Algo... algo no va bien. Según los estatutos del Imperium, ni siquiera el Lord Inquisidor en persona puede juzgar unilateralmente a {mf|un|una} Comerciante Independiente. ¡Me niego a participar en esto!».
languages.original_text: "Something... is wrong. According to the statutes of the Imperium, not even a Lord Inquisitor can unilaterally pass judgement on a Rogue Trader. I refuse to take part in this!"

traits.locale_text: «Algo... algo no va bien. Según los estatutos del Imperium, ni siquiera el Lord Inquisidor en persona puede juzgar unilateralmente a {mf|un|una} Comerciante Independiente. ¡Me niego a participar en esto!».

languages.text: "Yanlış olan bir şeyler var. İmparatorluk statüleri düşünüldüğünde, bir Lord Engizisyoncu bile tek taraflı olarak bir Hür Tacir'e ceza veremez. Bunun bir parçası olmayı reddediyorum!"
languages.original_text: "Something... is wrong. According to the statutes of the Imperium, not even a Lord Inquisitor can unilaterally pass judgement on a Rogue Trader. I refuse to take part in this!"

traits.locale_text: "Yanlış olan bir şeyler var. İmparatorluk statüleri düşünüldüğünde, bir Lord Engizisyoncu bile tek taraflı olarak bir Hür Tacir'e ceza veremez. Bunun bir parçası olmayı reddediyorum!"
